yes lol Adriana I have seen them in mid walk to almost like I caught in bet=
ween..either they were coming in or going out..I also seem one that was sor=
ta brown in color like he or she hadn't gotten in there full color yet..I'm=
 really not sure if they are spirits or what..because unlike spirits they d=
on't mind being looked at..with spirits soon as they figure out they been s=
potted there gone...these things will let you look at them..unless there no=
t aware they can be seen. Now the thin part you talking about I'm not sure =
what I have seen they actual look sorta bulky...but I wouldn't be surprised=
 if they come in all shapes..if I told you the stuff my daughter and I have=
 seen it would make your hair stand on end..one time we saw this pig lookin=
g creature for a quick sec..it had its back to us..we just looked at each o=
ther..we didn't talk about if for hours..I finally spoke and said you say t=
hat didn't you..she said the pig thing yeah...it was just
 once..another ti=
me we were sitting on my bed talking and say a women dress..just the hem of=
 her dress sway as if someone was leaving out of my room..like it was movin=
g with a swing swoosh..I can't explain but imagine someone with a full dres=
s moving fast..that how the hem looked..we looked at each other that time a=
t laughed..you can get that scared that your almost silly with fear..my dau=
ghters words were "what the fuck" I didn't mind her cussing that time lol

=

ok, that's just creepy... I'd like to think that if I saw a gho=
st in human form I'd have enough compassion for its humanity to not run off=
 screaming in the opposite direction... but if it got down on all fours all=
 bets are off... that just conjured an image of Samara in The Ring clawing =
her way up the well... *shiver*

When I was little a saw a pair of black/da=
rk shadow people walking away from my bed, very split second experience, al=
most like I was catching a glimpse of them on a walking journey... saw them=
 from their left side, very strange looking, same height almost like replic=
as of each other stood very close together, tall thin angular, almost like =
statues, or like the generic microsoft clip art style of people.... is that=
 what they look like? 

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Ursula Kalin <kalin=
u@...> wrote:
>
> shadow people is a norm to me..I seen one come from behin=
d a tree walking then get on all fours and shoot off..I almost had a heart =
attack..the last one I seen was in my kitchen..it walked by me...so I turne=
d expecting it to be gone..it wasn't. I grabbed my books and walked quickly=
 on the way up the stairs "you people are getting way to comfy here" lol it=
 was sort of funny if you think about it
> =C3=82=C2=A0
